mentorsStudyAbroad.overview: Mentors Study Abroad helps students pursue higher education globally with expert guidance on university selection, admission, visa processing, and scholarships.
mentorsStudyAbroad.remarks: We are not providing any services for the countries mentioned above. We are only providing information about the countries and their universities. above country link for more information

services.universitySelection: Personalized university matching based on your profile and career goals.
services.admissionAssistance: Full support with application preparation, SOPs, and documentation.
services.visaProcessing: Step-by-step visa application support including interview prep.
services.scholarshipGuidance: Information on need-based, merit-based, and country-specific scholarships.
services.preDepartureBriefing: Cultural adaptation, travel prep, and accommodation assistance.
services.fee: Our all services are free of cost. We are not charging any fee from the students.

onlineConsultation.description: We are providing online consultation for the students. You can contact us through our website or our social media platforms.
onlineConsultation.remarks: Please join the zoom meeting if you need to consult with us. We will provide you the best possible solution for your study abroad journey.

Uttara Campus 2.location: Level-7, Plot 17, Sonargaon Janopath, Sector-13, Uttara, Dhaka

Australia.location: 25 Soho Court, Keysborough VIC 3173, Melbourne, Australia

mentorsStudyAbroad.branchesRemarks: We provide services in the branches mentioned above. You can visit the branch to get the services about the countries and their universities.

successStories.description: 130+ Universities Affiliated, 800+ Successful Visas, 100+ Cities Affiliated, 7+ Years of Experience
